text.value: Publishing Information
Publisher - Who is the publisher?
Steward - Who is the steward?
License - What are the licensing terms for the content?
License Page - The IG includes a license page
External Content Licenses - Any referenced/included content contains appropriate licensing statements
Documentation - Overall documentation for the IG
Overview - Clear description of the project, purpose, and content
Scope - Clear delineation of what is included and excluded
Roadmap - Clear description of maintenance dependencies and known plans for future work
References - Permalinks and appropriate citations for the guideline and all relevant/referenced documentation
Content Index - Easily accessible index for all content
Recommendation Documentation - For each recommendation, the IG includes the following
Recommendation statement - Recommendation statement from the guideline
Qualify of Evidence - Quality of evidence, expressed using GRADE
Strength of Recommendation - Strength of recommendation, expressed using GRADE
Narrative Description - Narrative description of the recommendation and any additional documentation as appropriate
Workflow Diagram - Visual depiction of the workflow for the recommendation
Use Case - Description of the use case for the recommendation
Decision Points - Documentation of any decision points that impacted the L3 content
Referenced Artifacts - References to the implementation guide artifacts that formally describe the recommendation
Test Cases - Description of test cases for the recommendation and any associated test data
Artifacts - For each artifact, ensure the following information is present (ValueSet/CodeSystem/Profile/Library/ActivityDefinition/PlanDefinition/Measure/Questionnaire)
ID - Unique within the IG, somewhat friendly
url - Globally unique, somewhat friendly, canonical identifier for the artifact
identifier - Other identifiers (such as a VSAC or HL7 OID)
version - Version of the artifact
name - Machine-friendly name of the artifact
title - Human-readable name of the artifact
status - Status of the artifact
experimental - Whether the artifact is experimental
date - Publication date
publisher - Name of publishing organization or individual
contact - Contact information for the publisher
description - Clear description of the artifact
useContext - Coded contexts of use for the artifact (include at least clinical focus, setting, and any relevant demographics)
jurisdiction - Appropriate jurisdiction for the artifact
purpose - Purpose of the artifact
usage - Additional usage documentation for the artifact
approvalDate - Date the artifact was approved
lastReviewDate - Date the artifact was last reviewed
effectivePeriod - Effective period for the artifact
topic - Coded topics for the artifact
contributor - Contributors to the artifact content (author, reviewer, endorser)
copyright - Legal copyright for the artifact
relatedArtifact - Any related artifact references
ValueSet - In addition to the elements for all artifacts, for each value set, include the following
compose - The definition of the value set
shareableValueSet profile - Declare conformance with the shareableValueSet profile
knowledgeArtifactValueSet profile - Declare conformance with the knowledgeArtifactValueSet profile
expression extension - Provide expression extensions that define the value set content in terminology languages, if available
Profile - In addition to the elements for all artifacts, for each Profile, include the following
keyword - Coded keywords for the profile
example instance - An example instance conforming to the profile
Library - In addition to the elements for all artifacts, for each Library, include the following
dataRequirement - Data requirements for the library content
content - Base64 encoded content for CQL and ELM
CQL source - Include a reference to the source CQL in the IG
ELM content - Include a reference to the ELM content in the IG
PlanDefinition - In addition to the elements for all artifacts, for each PlanDefinition, include the following
triggerDefinition - When the artifact is triggered
condition - The condition for performing the action(s)
action - The action(s) to be performed
qualityOfEvidence - The qualityOfEvidence for the recommendation
strengthOfRecommendation - The strengthOfRecommendation for the recommendation
Testing - Ensure adequate testing of the IG content
Build - The IG builds successfully
Resources Load - All resources load without issues into a Clinical Reasoning knowledge repository
Test Cases Pass - All test cases pass without issues in a Clinical Reasoning reference implementation
Review - Content is reviewed and approved by
Guideline developer - The initial guideline developer
Terminologist - A clinical terminologist
Clinician - A clinician, preferably with expertise in the area of focus of the IG
Informaticist - An informaticist with expertise in the relevant specification standards
Engineer - An engineer from the alpha pilot site, ideally from multiple beta sites as well
Publish - Publish the content in the target content repository (FHIR Registry, Simplifier, CDS Connect)
Case Reporting (may belong in 3.e.) - Is there a potential need for monitoring disease trends or outbreak management?
Sending case to public health
Reporting Rules
Feedback to providers/reporters in clinical care
